text: Horacio Enrique Accavallo (14 October 1934 â€“ 13 September 2022) was an Argentine professional boxer. He competed from 1956 until 1967. He was the WBA and WBC flyweight champion March 1966 to October 1968."Sport in Brief "Boxing" " The Associated Press, Reading Eagle (Reading, Pennsylvania, United States), 2 March 1966."Accavallo Has Flyweight Title" UPI, The Washington Reporter (Washington, Pennsylvania, United States), 2 March 1966."Ring Results" The Associated Press, Spokane Daily Chronicle (Spokane, Washington, United States), 2 March 1966."Argentine's Accavallo Wins Flyweight Title" UPI, Madera Tribune (Madera, California, United States), 1 March 1966. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Argentine boxers Category:Sportspeople from Buenos Aires
